issue.title: [Java] Finish move of io.netty.buffer.ArrowBuf
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8687](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8687). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Strangely a few tests that reference io.netty.buffer.ArrowBuf weren't picked up in the automated tests.
